buginformation.summary: If cell exceeds TTL but not VERSIONs, will not be removed during major compaction
buginformation.description: Just noticed this reading code.

buginformation.summary: Add a section on the transparent CF encryption feature to the manual
buginformation.description: Document HBASE-7544 in detail in the manual.

buginformation.summary: [JDK8] ConcurrentSkipListMap class size changed
buginformation.description: ConcurrentSkipListMap in JDK < 8 has as members an integer and 8 references. In JDK 8, this changes to 6 members only. We can accommodate this change by estimating the structure size rather than hardcoding it.

buginformation.summary: Fix potential Resource Leak in ZNodeCleaner
Test for HBASE-9915 (avoid reading index blocks)
buginformation.description: In HBASE-9915 we found that for encoded blocks the quick check whether the seek key falls on the current block did not work.This adds a unittest so we won't regress. The test counts the number of blocks accessed (real data/index block in 0.94 and cache hits in trunk). Without HBASE-9915 we see about 50% more blocks hit in this test.

buginformation.summary: Make Sub Classes Static When Possible
buginformation.description: Coverity has found a few places where it's possible to change a private inner class to static with out any other code changes. This will be a small perf win.

buginformation.summary: Provide CP hook post log replay
Replaced deprecated interface Closeable
buginformation.description: Hadoop interface Closeable has been deprecated for quite some time to favor java.io.Closeable. Since we support only hadoop 1.0 and above now, we can replace the deprecated Closeable with the java one. We can also clean up some hack we did as well, for example, HBASE-10029.https://github.com/apache/hadoop-common/blob/branch-1.0/src/core/org/apache/hadoop/io/Closeable.java

buginformation.summary: Report back the message of split or rollback failure to the master
buginformation.description: A failure in splitting and rolling back causes an RS to abort with the error logged. However, the abort message sent back to the Master does not carry the same message for traceability.It would be useful if the Master at least had the message part of the exception given that its log writes are fewer than the RSs, helping capture reasons even if the RS loses its logs since, or couldn't log.

buginformation.summary: 0.94->0.96 Upgrade: ACL can't be repopulated when ACL table contains row for table '-ROOT' or '.META.'
buginformation.description: When 'ROOT', '.META' rows are contained in ACL table, during upgrade process, ACL zk nodes can't be populated to zookeeper because AccessControlLists#loadAll(HRegion) fails to load table permissions due to parsePermissionRecord throws IllegalArgumentException from TableName.valueof.

buginformation.summary: Remove unnecessary dependency on org.eclipse.jdt:core
buginformation.description: Transitive dependency on org.eclipse.jdt:core comes from org.mortbay.jetty:jsp-2.1This dependency is not needed.Removing it would get rid of the following jar under lib:-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3566844 Feb 20 20:50 core-3.1.1.jar

buginformation.summary: AM#CloseRegion no need to retry on FailedServerException
buginformation.description: When a regionserver restarts, AM#CloseRegion could get FailedServerException, or ServerNotRunningYetException. The call should not be retried since we know the original regionserver should be down.

buginformation.summary: multi-get should handle replica location missing from cache
buginformation.description: Currently the way cache works is that the meta row is stored together for all replicas of a region, so if some replicas are in recovery, getting locations for a region will still go to cache only and return null locations for these. Multi-get currently ignores such replicas. It should instead try to get location again from meta if any replica is null.

buginformation.summary: Add support for -h and --help to rolling_restart.sh and fix the usage string output
buginformation.description: Messing with rolling restart, when you pass -h or --help, you get a mess for output w/ an odd 'bad argument' complaint....The usage string printed also was incomplete w curlies in it.

buginformation.summary: Add back support for running ChaosMonkey as standalone tool
buginformation.description: According to the ref guide, it was once possible to run ChaosMonkey as a standalone tool against a deployed cluster. After 0.94, this is no longer possible.

buginformation.summary: Compilation errors are not posted back to JIRA during QA run
buginformation.description: Compile errors are not posted to JIRA because checkCompilationErrors misses call to submitJiraCommentHere is an example:https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9957/console

buginformation.summary: TableSnapshotRegionSplit should be public
buginformation.description: This class extends Writable and so should be public so it can be used outside of the existing code line we ship. This will be consistent with TableSplit, which is also public.

buginformation.summary: Add -Dsurefire.rerunFailingTestsCount=2 to patch build runs so flakies get rerun
buginformation.description: Tripped over this config today: -Dsurefire.rerunFailingTestsCount=I made a test fail, then pass, and I got this output: Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Flakes: 1Notice the 'Flakes' addition on the far-right.Let me enable this on hadoopqa builds. Hopefully will help make it so new contribs are not frightened off by flakies thinking their patch the cause.

buginformation.summary: HCM throws NullPointerException under load
buginformation.description: HCM uses SoftValueSortedMap to cache region locations. Under load, some soft referred values may be GCed. So we should check if the value is null. Otherwise, NPE will be thrown: for (Map<byte[], HRegionLocation> tableLocations : cachedRegionLocations.values()) { for (Entry<byte[], HRegionLocation> e : tableLocations.entrySet()) { ===> if (serverName.equals(e.getValue().getServerName())) { tableLocations.remove(e.getKey()); deletedSomething = true; } } }

buginformation.summary: Update hadoop in lib on 0.18 hbase branch to 0.18.1
List tables API should filter with isSystemTable
REST should use listTableNames to list tables
Thrift should use listTableNames to list tables
Column family and qualifier should be allowed to be set as null in grant shell command
buginformation.description: In 0.94, grant.rb has the following:Grant users specific rights.Syntax : grant <user> <permissions> [<table> [<column family> [<column qualifier>]]In 0.95.2, when I tried to grant permission on a table to user hrt_1, I got some exception:hbase(main):003:0> grant 'hrt_1', 'R', 't1'ERROR: java.lang.NullPointerException: nullHere is some help for this command:Grant users specific rights.Syntax : grant <user> <permissions> <table> <column family> <column qualifier>permissions is either zero or more letters from the set "RWXCA".READ('R'), WRITE('W'), EXEC('X'), CREATE('C'), ADMIN('A')For example: hbase> grant 'bobsmith', 'RWXCA' hbase> grant 'bobsmith', 'RW', 't1', 'f1', 'col1'Column family and qualifier should be allowed to be set as null in grant shell command

buginformation.summary: Test Big Linked List fails on Hadoop 2.1.0
Log HBase Master command line arguments on startup
buginformation.description: Region server already log JVM information (name, version, vendor, command line arguments, etc). Would be useful to have Master do it too.

buginformation.summary: [UI] Catalog tables section isn't aligned
buginformation.description: I attached a picture of what I got. You can see it doesn't look right.One more thing is that the page doesn't auto-refresh when you switch tabs. For example, click Catalog tables, create a new table, click User tables, you don't see the new table. You need to refresh the page to see it.

buginformation.summary: Startup scripts create 2 .out files.
buginformation.description: When start HBase with bin/start-hbase.sh, script creates 2 out files.-rw-r--r-- 1 jmspaggiari jmspaggiari 0 Aug 31 15:38 hbase-jmspaggiari-master-t430s.out-rw-r--r-- 1 jmspaggiari jmspaggiari 0 Aug 31 15:38 hbase-jmspaggiari-master-t430s.out.1Should create only one.

buginformation.summary: start-hbase.cmd doesn't need the execute flag.
buginformation.description: When you do start- and tabulation, since there start-hbase.cmd has the execution flag, completion go only up to start-hbase.We should remove the execution flag for this script.

buginformation.summary: Add more informative client column to Integration Test Linked List
Log splitting should not start till HDFS out of safe mode
buginformation.description: Distributed log splitting manager is started before we wait for HDFS to be out of safe mode. This leads to log splitting failure since HDFS can't replicate blocks to write the recovered edits.

buginformation.summary: htrace synchronized on getInstance
buginformation.description: When doing tests on cached data, one of the bottleneck is the getInstance() on HTrace, called in RequestContext#set() --> Trace.isTracing()When it's fixed, we see threads blocked in sendResponse and in the metrics (with hadoop 1).The difference is not huge (it's in the range 0-5%), but there is no reason to keep this.I'm sending a pull request to htrace.

buginformation.summary: hdfs-site.xml is not excluded from the it-test jar
buginformation.description: if hbase-it-tests.jar is in the classpath before the hadoop dir conf the user hdfs-site.xml is ignored.A fix was already done with HBASE-8510, but that exclude was applied only to hbase-server.

buginformation.summary: NPE while updating RegionServers with the favored nodes assignments from the client tool
buginformation.description: A null check was missed. This leads to NPEs in the client tool when the tool generates the favored nodes assignment and tries to update the RegionServers with the information.

buginformation.description: It was changed to 100ms, but kept as 1000ms in a lot of places...

buginformation.description: There are not many javadoc warnings. We can fix them all.

buginformation.description: Maven doesn't seem to play well with trasitive dependencies from -test jars. We should follow the lead of hadoop-common and create a module for test utilities.

remove htrace-zipkin from the runtime dependencies

buginformation.summary: Use the region name, not the encoded name, when region is not on current server
buginformation.description: When we throw a RegionOpeningException or a NotServingRegionException we put the encoded region name in the exception, which isn't super useful. I propose putting the region name instead.

buginformation.summary: Improve HBASE-9428 - avoid copying bytes for RegexFilter unless necessary
buginformation.description: Parent patch copies input for RegexFilter unconditionally.We should only do this if the KV portion into the passed byte[] is < 1/2 of the passed byte[]. Otherwise we waste cycles.Patch is trivial and will be coming momentarily.
